TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PropertyListFormatException extends Claunia.PropertyList.PropertyListException

Docs.summary: A PropertyListFormatException is thrown by the various property list format parsers when an error in the format of the given property list is encountered.

Docs.param: A message containing information about the nature of the exception.
